long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drop Impact Hebrew Assistance. Add a tool over "promo.com" site for reversing hebrew strings.

Drop Impact is a project for creating videos for people that suffer from trauma as a way to deal with the trauma.

Drop Impact use video platform "promo.com" for helping the people to create video easily.

People that use Hebrew have a problem with promo.com - it reverse the Hebrew strings.

This extension add a dialog to the site in which the user can enter Hebrew string and get a reversed version of it.

Now the user can copy paste the string into promo.com input boxes and the result will be a readable Hebrew string.
